definition: to blacken/abbr. for 涅槃[nie4 pan2]
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
Leonid Brezhnev (1906-1982), Soviet statesman, General Secretary of the Communist Party of the USSR 1966-1982
Nyeva or Neva River (through St Petersburg)
the Nyeva or Neva river (through St Petersburg)
Polonius (name)/Shakespearean character, father of Ophelia, accidentally killed by Hamlet
Virgil's Aeneid (epic about the foundation of Rome)
the great Nirvana sutra: every living thing has Buddha nature.

pinyin: Ao4 la4 nie4 si1 ta3 de2

definition: Ganesha (the elephant-headed God in Hinduism, son of Shiva and Parvati)

sentences.english: Should one renounce Nirvana oneself, in order to help others towards it first?
sentences.chinese: 人應該放棄自己的涅磐，爲了首先幫助它人達到它？

sentences.english: The Chorus recounts the events leading to Antigone's tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 合唱團的敘述了事件導致安提戈涅的悲劇。

sentences.english: Antigone rejects her, but she does not deserve to die with her.
sentences.chinese: 安提戈涅拒絕她，但她不應該與她的死亡。

sentences.english: Indians are generally keen on the animal in whose form is manifested a popular god, Ganesh.
sentences.chinese: 印度人普遍非常喜歡該種顯現了象頭神格涅沙的動物。

sentences.english: The world forgives Richard Wagner's unscrupulousness, but it will not forgive mine.
sentences.chinese: 世人原諒瓦格涅的疏狂，可是我他們不會原諒我。

sentences.english: Tyche was the name of the "good sister" of Nemesis.
sentences.chinese: 在神話中，堤喀是涅墨西斯的“好姐妹”。

sentences.english: Through the abandoning of what is there said to be Unbinding ?
sentences.chinese: 拋棄什麼，纔是人們所說的涅磐？

sentences.english: Nirvana is uncompounded, not made of anything yet it exists.
sentences.chinese: 涅磐是沒有混合的，不會由存在的東西構成。

sentences.english: Creative alligator shaped bread sculpture is too cool to eat.
sentences.chinese: 大塊麪包做成的鱷魚造型，太酷了，誰還捨得喫涅？

sentences.english: Earthlings forgive nuttiness of Wagner, but they are not going to forgive me.
sentences.chinese: 世人原諒瓦格涅的疏狂，可是他們不會原諒我。

sentences.english: Suddenly Ismene enters, also asking where Antigone has been.
sentences.chinese: 伊斯美妮突然進入，還要求在安提戈涅已。
一天，他看見帕爾塞福涅。

sentences.english: Baisha in nirvana, with Ju black.
Action Parinirvana possesses two kinds, which may have the two carnal bodies or four carnal bodies.
sentences.chinese: 行動涅磐有兩類，這有兩種肉身或四種肉體。

sentences.english: Hence we say that the Tathagata enters Great Nirvana.
sentences.chinese: 因此我們說如來進入了涅磐。

definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism/abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]/abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican
ten (used in fractions, writing checks etc)/assorted/miscellaneous
see 莎草[suo1 cao3]/see 摩莎[mo2 suo1]
to divine/to forecast or estimate/(of a place to live etc) to choose
phonetic fei or fi/elegant/phi (Greek letter Φ, φ)
solemn/reverent/calm/burial position in an ancestral tomb (old)/old variant of 默
crotch/15th of the 28th constellations of Chinese astronomy
